channel.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
channel.description:
Whats the worst game you've ever played?
[url='https://www.youtube.com/embed/G2G3W9qWeJc']Deus Ex[/url]
Get mad if you want, it sucks and it's unplayable.

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Dreadmoth:

Dawn of War 2 (at least, the single-player campaign) is more of a Real-Time Tactics game (like Men of War ) than an RTS.
Fuskox is right about the RPG elements, though they are fairly basic.

euhm what? tactics are part of strategy

real-time tactics = real-time strategy

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: Guzzi
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Why did we have to reawaken this flamefest?

Because I had to join in on the fun, that’s why.

Also another game that was absolutely evil to it’s core was Final Fantasy 11. They pull you in. Make you pay a monthly fee to play. The higher you level the farther you must travel (I spent more time traveling than I did anything else), the longer it takes to level and the mandatory having to find a party which, at times could take hours. Why? Whhhhyyyyyy!!! The economy in the game was terrible too! It was nearly impossible to earn money for new armor unless you were a high level and I heard people literally spent their total playtime of over a year to get maxed out on just one class. That’s over 8500 hours of sitting in your computer chair staring at a screen. And 5000 of those hours were most likely spent running around getting to your next monotonous objective… Leveling… Blah!

And worst of all, they came out with FFXIV which is the same exact fucking thing. Someone tell me why please… :[

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?

Dawn of War 2 (at least, the single-player campaign) is more of a Real-Time Tactics game (like Men of War ) than an RTS.
Fuskox is right about the RPG elements, though they are fairly basic.

item.source: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Medevilae:

It wasn’t that good, and don’t talk out of your ass about art direction… Have you ever been to NY? Well, they went for that and kind of failed at it.

It was ok, story was cheesy for the most part, and like most Rockstar games, was a direct console to PC port that bled out it’s ass with lack of any optimization.

I actually rather liked GTA4. The story was simply put, amazing. Excellent writing, comparable to masterwork entries in the crime fiction genre like “Heat.” Considering many of the older GTA games were pastiches of crime films lacking in substance, GTA4 is a much more serious treatment of similar subject material. They keep their anarchistic sense of humor, but it never crowds out the strong narrative.

However, it irked me that there was no iron sights on the M4 rifle.

As for overrated and a game I hated, that honor goes to Halo 3 for completely failing on every promise the second game made. The narrative is wrapped up in brief and unsatisfying fashion, the game mechanics were newly nerfed from 2, the AI was still dumb as a brick through a window (And yes, I did play on Heroic and Legendary, the real difference is that shots do more damage, a la HL2), and on the whole the multiplayer was just not very fun. Forge isn’t flexible enough for mapping- they should have used a dedicated tool like Far Cry 2 (Another game I thought wasn’t all that great, but I spent quite a bit of time in the level editor).

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
MDIGN:

It came too late. Oblivion was already out and blew this game out of the water. I had to force myself to play through the demo, it made ma want to barf. Combat sucks, graphics suck, story suck, gameplay suck, Two Worlds sucks.

For me it was a “its so bad its good situation”

Read full topic

item.source: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Mr. Bucket:

So what about underrated games?

I could easily mention GTA IV wich, tough it got 10/10 from IGN, seems to be pretty hated by fans nowadays. In my oppinion its FAAAAAAAAR supperior to San Andreas. The map is about 3/4 as big yet its so detailed, it feels alot smaller than it actually is. Some people say its boring because all you do is go bowling and stuff… YEAH!!! That reminds me of San Andreas, where all you did was gambling…

People seem to forget how groundbreaking the gameplay is. Most of the interactions you have with the environnement are physic based, wich makes every moment unique and one hell of alot more satisfying than any other GTA. And the level of details in the environnement and sound desing is just astronomical, a real masterpiece! Its really JUST AS GOOD Half Life 2 in therm of overall desing (if not better) , regardless of the fact that GTA IV is set in a huge-ass city in wich you free to travel in and that HL2 is a linear corridor shooter(without getting too much into details).

In my oppinion GTA IV could easily be the best game of all time because. I mean, even if you couldn’t travel freely trough the city… The story, the art desing and the gameplay themself would be enough to make it the best game of all time…

It wasn’t that good, and don’t talk out of your ass about art direction… Have you ever been to NY? Well, they went for that and kind of failed at it.

It was ok, story was cheesy for the most part, and like most Rockstar games, was a direct console to PC port that bled out it’s ass with lack of any optimization.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?

item.title: Whats the absolutely most horrid and overrated game you have ever played?
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

This is technically off topic but I feel the need to exprese this.

Two Worlds is the absolutely most horrid underrated game I’ve ever played.

It came too late. Oblivion was already out and blew this game out of the water. I had to force myself to play through the demo, it made ma want to barf. Combat sucks, graphics suck, story suck, gameplay suck, Two Worlds sucks.

Read full topic
